sourcesContent:
<script>
	import api from "./api";
	import ArticleContent from "./components/ArticleContent.vue";
	import CommentList from "./components/CommentList.vue";
	export default {
		name: "App",
		components: { ArticleContent, CommentList },
		mounted() {
			this.getData();
		},
		data() {
			return {
				article: null,
				comments: []
			};
		},
		methods: {
			getData() {
				api.get("article", {}, data => {
					this.article = data;
					// console.log("content:", data);
				});
				api.get("comments", {}, data => {
					this.comments = data;
					// console.log("comments", data);
				});
			}
		}
	};
</script>

<template>
	<ArticleContent v-if="article" :article="article" />
	<CommentList v-if="comments.length" :comments="comments" />
</template>

<style scoped></style>
